QueryResult.text: SELECT C.ID, C.COMPONENT_CODE, C.COMPONENT_VERSION, C.IS_ACTIVE, C.IS_SYSTEM, C.IS_REPORT_ENABLED, C.CREATED_DATE, C.CREATED_BY, C.LAST_UPDATED_DATE, C.LAST_UPDATED_BY, NLS.LANGUAGE_CODE, NLS.NAME, NLS.DESCRIPTION FROM CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS NLS, CMN_COMPONENTS C WHERE NLS.TABLE_NAME = 'CMN_COMPONENTS' AND NLS.PK_ID = C.ID
